info.description: IstioConfig project, observability for the Istio service mesh
info.title: IstioConfig

get.description: Endpoint to get the details of a given service
获取服务链路追踪信息接口

is_core.description: When true, the component is necessary for Istio to function. Otherwise, it is an addon

name.description: The app label value of the Istio component

status.description: The status of a Istio component

idleTimeout.description: 一个连接idle状态的最大时长,默认1h （1h/1m/10s）

ConnectionPoolSettings_TCPSettings.title: Settings common to both HTTP and TCP upstream connections.

connect_timeout.description: TCP连接超时时间 （1h/1m/1s/1ms. MUST BE >=1ms. Default is 10s）

max_connections.description: Envoy为上游集群建立的最大连接数

interval.description:
The time duration between keep-alive probes.
Default is to use the OS level configuration
(unless overridden, Linux defaults to 75s.)

probes.description:
Maximum number of keepalive probes to send without response before
deciding the connection is dead. Default is to use the OS level configuration
(unless overridden, Linux defaults to 9.)

time.description:
The time duration a connection needs to be idle before keep-alive
probes start being sent. Default is to use the OS level configuration
(unless overridden, Linux defaults to 7200s (ie 2 hours.)

GWInfo.description: GWInfo contains the resolved gateway configuration if the node represents an Istio gateway

GWInfoIngress.description: GWInfoIngress contains the resolved gateway configuration if the node represents an Istio ingress gateway

hostnames.description: Hostnames is the list of hosts being served by the associated Istio gateways.

headers.description: http请求头匹配规则，只能选prefix，exact，regex中一个

uri.description: uri匹配规则, key只能为prefix，exact，regex中一个

HealthConfig.description: HealthConfig maps annotations information for health

IstioConfigList.description: This type is used for returning a response of IstioConfigList
IstioConfigList.title: IstioConfigList istioConfigList

IstioValidationKey.title: IstioValidationKey is the key value composed of an Istio ObjectType and Name.

IstioValidations.title: IstioValidations represents a set of IstioValidation grouped by IstioValidationKey.

KeyValue.title: KeyValue is a key-value pair with typed value.

LoadBalancerSettings.description: 负载均衡策略，simple和consistentHash只能选择一个

Log.description: Log is a log emitted in a span

MTLSStatus.description: MTLSStatus describes the current mTLS status of a mesh entity

base_ejection_time.description: 最小驱逐时间。驱逐时间会随着错误次数增加而增加。即错误次数*最小驱逐时间

consecutive_errors.description: 连续错误次数。对于HTTP服务，502、503、504会被认为异常，TPC服务，连接超时即异常

max_ejection_percent.description: 负载均衡池中可以被驱逐的实例的最大比例。以免某个接口瞬时不可用，导致太多实例被驱逐，进而导致服务整体全部不可用。

Process.description: Process is the process emitting a set of spans

ProcessID.title: ProcessID is a hashed value of the Process struct that is unique within the trace.

ProtocolTraffic.description: ProtocolTraffic supplies all of the traffic information for a single protocol

Reference.description: Reference is a reference from one span to another

ReferenceType.description: ReferenceType is the reference type of one span to another

ResourcePermissions.description:
ResourcePermissions holds permission flags for an object type
True means allowed.

ResponseDetail.title: ResponseDetail holds information broken down by response code.

ResponseFlags.title: ResponseFlags is a map of maps. Each response code is broken down by responseFlags:percentageOfTraffic, e.g.:

ResponseHosts.title: ResponseHosts is a map of maps. Each response host is broken down by responseFlags:percentageOfTraffic, e.g.:

Responses.description: Responses maps responseCodes to detailed information for that code

SEInfo.description: SEInfo provides static information about the service entry

ServiceHealth.description: ServiceHealth contains aggregated health from various sources, for a given service

Span.description:
Span is a span denoting a piece of work in some infrastructure
When converting to UI model, ParentSpanID and Process should be dereferenced into
References and ProcessID, respectively.
When converting to ES model, ProcessID and Warnings should be omitted. Even if
included, ES with dynamic settings off will automatically ignore unneeded fields.

SpanID.description: SpanID is the id of a span

StatusInfo.description: This is used for returning a response of Kiali Status
StatusInfo.title: StatusInfo statusInfo

externalServices.description: An array of external services installed

status.description:
The state of Kiali
A hash of key,values with versions of Kiali and state

items.example: Istio version 0.7.1 is not supported, the version should be 0.8.0

Trace.title: Trace is a list of spans,

TraceID.title: TraceID is the shared trace ID of all spans in the trace.

UInt32Value.description: The JSON representation for `UInt32Value` is JSON number.
UInt32Value.title: Wrapper message for `uint32`.

VSInfo.title: VSInfo contains the resolved VS configuration if the node has a VS attached.

hostnames.description: Hostnames is the list of hostnames configured in the associated VSs

ValueType.title: ValueType is the type of a value stored in KeyValue struct.

WorkloadListItem.description: WorkloadListItem has the necessary information to display the console workload list

appLabel.description: Define if Pods related to this Workload has the label App

istioInjectionAnnotation.description:
Define if Workload has an explicit Istio policy annotation
It's mapped as a pointer to show three values nil, true, false

istioSidecar.description: Define if Pods related to this Workload has an IstioSidecar deployed

versionLabel.description: Define if Pods related to this Workload has the label Version

externalServiceInfo.description: This is used for returning a response of Kiali Status
externalServiceInfo.title: Status response model

version.description: The installed version of the service

namespace.description:
A Namespace provide a scope for names
This type is used to describe a set of objects.

badRequestError.description: BadRequestError: the client request is incorrect

graphResponse.description: 服务流量图请求返回值

istioConfigList.description: HTTP status code 200 and IstioConfigList model in data

istioStatusResponse.description: Return a list of Istio components along its status

notAcceptableError.description: A NotAcceptable is the error message that means request can't be accepted

notFoundError.description: A NotFoundError is the error message that is generated when server could not find what was requested.

serviceDetailsResponse.description: Listing all the information related to a workload

serviceUnavailableError.description: A Internal is the error message that means something has gone wrong

statusInfo.description: HTTP status code 200 and statusInfo model in data
